strapiPost.title: Bentonville's June First Friday Theme Is Art Fest
strapiPost.content:
Bentonville's June First Friday theme is Art Fest, a celebration of creativity sure to engage all five senses on Jun 2, with events happening at the Bentonville Square from 11a-9p.

  • Creative spaces: Leatherworking, homemade soaps, instruments, painters, jewelry, henna, and more; there will be a multitude of artistic expressions to explore throughout Downtown Bentonville during this First Friday celebration. Don't forget the Schmieding Family Sensory Alley is available for those who may find First Friday overstimulating.
  • Let's get it started: Food trucks will open at 11a for lunch, and the rest of First Friday will run from 3-9p. The DJ lineup includes M. Bolez at 5p, Allen.MP3 at 6p, and headliner DJ Afrosia on stage from 7-9p.

Read more about what to expect at June First Friday HERE.
